name: Hidden Lab
description:
Official Windows build by Migdyn: 

Rob a hidden laboratory as fast as you can!

Game made in C++ and SFML with no game engine in 4 hours by kacperks (https://kacperks.cubesoftware.xyz/) & Looki2000(https://looki2000.cubesoftware.xyz/)
